experiences: Utilized data analytics techniques to analyze user engagement and behavior on an Edutech website. Leveraged tools like Figma to create high-fidelity prototypes and track user interactions, resulting in a 10% increase in user engagement and a 30% decrease in bounce rates.

Employed Python for data analysis, front-end design, and backend development, ensuring seamless integration and a cohesive user experience. This comprehensive approach facilitated informed decision-making through actionable insights gleaned from Python-based data analysis and visualization.

Completed Salesforce Developer Catalyst Trail Mix, earning two super badges (Apex Specialist and Process Automation Specialist). Worked on mini projects focused on data analysis and process automation using Salesforce.
